org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs

Class IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs.IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, EvictionPolicy<org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.IgfsBlockKey,byte[]>, IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicyMXBean

    public class IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy
extends Object
implements EvictionPolicy<org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.IgfsBlockKey,byte[]>, IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicyMXBean, Externalizable
    IGFS eviction policy which evicts particular blocks.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy

        public IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy(long maxSize,
                             int maxBlocks)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Maximum size. When reached, eviction begins.
        maxBlocks - Maximum amount of blocks. When reached, eviction begins.

      • IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy

        public IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy(long maxSize,
                             int maxBlocks,
                             @Nullable
                             Collection<String> excludePaths)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Maximum size. When reached, eviction begins.
        maxBlocks - Maximum amount of blocks. When reached, eviction begins.
        excludePaths - Collection of regex for path which must not be evicted.

      • exclude

        public boolean exclude(IgfsPath path)
                throws IgniteCheckedException
        Check whether provided path must be excluded from evictions.
        Parameters:
        path - Path.
        Returns:
        True in case non block of related file must be excluded.

        IgniteCheckedException - In case of faulty patterns.
